content: **for 5 other haruni variations please see the haruni variations collection ebook** 1 five years to the hour after releasing the original haruni i m very pleased to offer this simple variation this is a variation that has been knit countless times already here it it is just presented in one complete pattern the stockinette body increases 6 stitches every other row creating a wide shallow triangle using just a single skein of most sock yarns because this is worked top down it is easy to adjust the overall size by working more row of stockinette if you choose to use beads you will need approximately 350 size 6/0 seed beads pattern has been test knit and includes charts line by line directions and stitch count totals for every row ** errata available here 2 ** 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/haruni-variations-collection 2 https //knitterain com/errata html
